title: Olympic National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials The Freeing the Elwha Curriculum, developed by a team of Interpretive Park Rangers at Olympic National Park, will help you teach your class about Elwha River Restoration through science, social studies, creative response and mathematics. All Curriculum Materials   Featured Currcicula    Freeing the Elwha (Removing the Dams and Restoring the River) Learn More     Field Trips Bring your students to Olympic. Find resources for planning your own classroom visit.  All Field Trips   Plan Your Field Trip!    Plan Your Field Trip! Learn More     Guest Speakers Education rangers can provide hands-on, interactive programs to your classroom. All Guest Speakers   Guest Speakers    Ecosystems Olympic! Learn More     Traveling Trunks Learn what you can borrow from us for your class! All Traveling Trunks   Featured Traveling Trunk    Borrow the Living Forest Trunk Learn More     Materials to Loan Check out additional materials available for loan to families.
